subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Mark Cavendish won the rainy 12th stage of the Giro d’Italia for his 100th career victory, while Vincenzo Nibali maintained his overall lead.
snippet: The sprinter Mark Cavendish won the rainy 12th stage of the Giro d’Italia for his 100th career victory, while Vincenzo Nibali maintained his overall lead.
